channel.title: Ollie Threatens to Sue a "Friend" Under False Accusations
channel.description:
This closely related friend wanted me to share a message with you all:
Paypal dispute for work done: [quote] The Developer was paid to do some SQL database work but never completed the work correctly. He ended up released the websites user database which contained passwords. This could actually be a criminal offence. [/quote] Skype: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/13RxKum.png[/img] As a result, here is the PRS06 source. Since it is not theirs, they have no copywrite in place, I signed no contracts saying I wouldn't release it, and I'm not scared of that 420 blazing moron anyway so here you go: http://up.ht/12Hf587 Note to mods: Remove the link if it is not allowed, but please keep the post since it is personal life and not server versus server related. So here's my payback for gaining back your money, you lose even more! This includes the work I did.

Wanna catch me up?

item.title: Ollie Threatens to Sue a "Friend" Under False Accusations
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

PayPal actually won’t give a shit! I remb some guy disputed $100 (after i transferred it to my real account) and all that happened was the account ended up getting closed and I still had the money?

If hes going to sue which I highly doubt he will, it’ll take time and money + no legal issues were discussed at the time.

and… i support the following:

Clawz fury:

this is kind of pathetic imo

Agent Jugz:

no one cares and it’s $115. big deal ngl

Jmood:

42 mbs, either you’re using a lot of libs or this is a pile of shit code.

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:3, topic:485496”]sini im going to let you in on a little something
nobody loveing cares anymore[/quote]

Read full topic
